meanings.definition: A person or animal that waddles.
meanings.sent1: The penguins at the zoo are cute waddlers.
meanings.sent2: Ducks are known as waddlers because of their unique way of walking.
meanings.sent3: The waddlers in the park made everyone smile with their funny steps.
meanings.sent4: The waddlers on the ice looked like fluffy balls sliding around.
meanings.sent5: The toddler imitated the penguin waddlers, bringing laughter to the room.

meanings.definition: Those who move with short steps from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The elderly waddlers crossed the street carefully.
meanings.sent2: The waddlers in the parade danced joyfully to the music.
meanings.sent3: The waddlers in the office shuffle around slowly during break time.
meanings.sent4: The waddlers on the dance floor swayed gracefully to the rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The little waddlers in the playground giggled as they toddled along.
